ValidationRule.description: Inventory Reference 1…5 can't have duplicate values.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(OR((NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_1__c))) && OR(TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_1__c)== TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_2__c), TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_1__c)== TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_3__c), TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_1__c)== TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_4__c), TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_1__c)== TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_5__c))), ((NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_2__c))) && OR(TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_2__c)== TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_3__c), TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_2__c)== TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_4__c), TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_2__c)== TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_5__c)))), ((NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_3__c))) && OR(TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_3__c)== TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_4__c), TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_3__c)== TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_5__c)))), ((NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_4__c))) && TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_4__c)== TEXT(cgcloud__Inventory_Reference_5__c)))),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Inventory Reference 1…5 can't have duplicate values.
